definition: to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: From the map, one can see water spilling eastward and southward.
sentences.chinese: 在地圖上可以看出湖水向東和向南奔瀉。

sentences.english: An angry torrent rolls thunderously on for a thousand li.
Tons of water rushed over the falls.
sentences.chinese: 幾噸的水奔瀉過這個瀑布。

sentences.english: He could hardly articulate the words that tumbled passionately from his lips.
sentences.chinese: 從他的嘴裏奔瀉而出的激動話語，幾乎難以聽清。

sentences.english: When the pipes burst, water poured down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 水管破裂後，水從樓梯上奔瀉下來。
